info.title: Provisioning API
info.description: This application enables a set of APIs that external systems can use to manage users, groups and apps.

get.description: Returns a list of groups details with ids and displaynames
returns an array of users in the specified group
returns an array of users details in the specified group
returns a list of users and their data
gets user info from the currently logged in user
Get the groups a user is a subadmin of

delete.description: Removes a subadmin from a group
